actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to amend rule XXII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that any private bill relating to immigration or naturalization be accompanied by a statement that the Member introducing such bill shall receive no compensation with respect to his introduction of such bill.

summary.text: Requires that any private bill relating to immigration or naturalization be accompanied by a statement that the Member introducing such bill shall receive no compensation with respect to his introduction of such bill. (Amends rule XXII of the Rules of the House of Representatives)

titles.title: Resolution to amend rule XXII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that any private bill relating to immigration or naturalization be accompanied by a statement that the Member introducing such bill shall receive no compensation with respect to his introduction of such bill.
